constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 128 (Wednesday, July 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. STEVENS:
H.R. 4610.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H3803]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Research and Technology.

title: To establish an expansion awards pilot program as a part of the Hollings Manufacturing Extension Partnership, and for other purposes.
